title: Multiplayer Issues
message:
We have received reports of some issues in the multiplayer mode. If you are experiencing any difficulties, please send us a ticket so we can review your case and assist you as soon as possible.
We are currently investigating whether these issues are related to the recent Steam outages or other factors. We appreciate your patience, as most players are able to play without any problems, and we are actively working to ensure an optimal experience for everyone.
Thank you for your understanding and support as we resolve this matter.
